title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page

name: Tiddlywiki Static Page
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/readme","text":"
此插件不建议普通tiddlywiki用户使用, 并且只适用于tiddlywiki nodejs版本,
* supported nodejs tw local and static online !! Tips !! Tutorials 需要在tiddlywiki.info 文件中添加这样一段代码， 然后在命令行中运行 `(npx) tiddlywiki --build static` ```wikitext "static": [ "--output", "dist", "--rendertiddlers", "[!is[system]]", "$:/core/templates/static.tiddler.html", "static", "text/plain", "--rendertiddler", "$:/core/templates/static.template.css", "static/static.css", "text/plain" ] ``` * Tiddlywiki Static Page * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-static-page]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/ui/new-page":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/ui/new-page","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","description":"new-page","caption":"new-page","list-before":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/close","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]]"> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}!match[file:]]"> <$button tooltip="jump new-page and copy url" aria-label="new-page" class=<>> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]"> <$set name="pathname" value={{{ [[$:/info/url/pathname]get[text]] }}}> <$set name=uri value={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]search-replace,[/]addsuffix[static/]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}} > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" $param=<> /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-external-window" $param=<>/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[http:]]"> <$set name="uri" value={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}} > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-external-window" $param=<>/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new-page"/> "}}}
